entry.title: Wowo's Tar & Glue Remover
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Tar Remover
Price: 10.99

There is nothing worse than having all those horrible tar spots, or hardened tree sap stuck to your glorious paintwork. That’s why we made Wowo’s TAR & GLUE REMOVER! Simply apply, let it work its magic and wipe or rinse off. Ta Da.

NOTE: Wowo's Tar and Glue Remover CANNOT be air shipped.

entry.title: Wowo's Leather Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Leather Treatment
Price: 14.99

Wowo’s LEATHER CLEANER is Step One in the Wowo’s Leather Cleaning System! LEATHER CLEANER will target unwanted fats and oils within the leather and restore it to an OEM Matte Finish appearance. Before applying Wowo’s LEATHER CLEANER, we always recommend testing on an inconspicuous area first for color fastness. From there, liberally spray the target areas and work the product into the leather with a clean Microfiber Towel. Flip the towel as needed and wipe dry. For deeper stains (such as Blue Jeans dye transfer), agitate the product with a soft bristle brush and wipe dry with a clean Microfiber Towel. Once your leather is cleaned and restored, we highly recommend protecting it with Wowo's Leather Cream.
  • A SERIOUS LEATHER CLEANER: Wowo’s LEATHER CLEANER Can Be Used On ALL Things Leather in Your Vehicle’s Interior
  • TARGETS FATS & BODY OILS: Leather Seats Looking Shiny and Greasy? Leather Cleaner Will Return Your Leather To Its Desired New Looking Matte Finish
  • LATHER UP THE LEATHER: Creates a Foamy and Effective Lather With Soft Brush Agitation
  • MATTE LOOK AND LEATHER SCENT: Leaves An OEM Like Finish With a New Leather Scent   
  • AMERICA'S PREMIER AUTOMOTIVE MICROFIBER and DETAILING PRODUCTS Manufacturer / Distributor Since 1999. THE RAG COMPANY - Always The Better Value!

How To Use:

  1. Give the bottle a good shake
  2. Liberally spray the leather areas which you want to clean
  3. either work into the leather using a high quality Microfiber towel or use a soft nail brush and work into troubled areas
  4. Wipe the remaining residue off with a high quality Microfiber towel
  5. Repeat if necessary. This product should be used in conjunction with Wowo's Leather Cream for best results

entry.title: Wowo's Glass Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Vehicle Washing & Glass Cleaning
Price: 14.99

There’s not much to know about Wowo’s Glass Cleaner expect that it is as simple as can be with a powerful clean. Wowo’s Glass Cleaner provides a streak free glass that allows for a safer drive. Wowo’s Glass Cleaner is made without alcohol and ammonia, making it safe for tinted windows. Wowo’s Glass Cleaner is perfect antidote to smoker and vape film as well! Wowo’s Glass Cleaner is easy-to-use, it literally only take two steps!

Your windshield is your window to the world when driving… have a dirty windshield and prepare for a less than safe drive. You don’t want contaminants or streaks leaving you blinded when on the road. Make window cleaning simple and hassle free with just one easy product, Wowo’s Glass Cleaner.

Wowo’s Glass Cleaner cleans contaminants such as dirt, tar, dust and grime, off your glass, leaving behind a crystal-clear surface. Now, a lot of cleaners can promise the same results, but Wowo’s Glass Cleaner can promise a streak-free finish. After all, this nothing worse than taking the time to clean your windows only to get in the car later and notice streaks clouding your vision. Wowo’s Glass Cleaner is also tough on smoke and vape film.

Not all glass cleaners can be treated equally, but Wowo’s Glass Cleaner can be put above the rest! Wowo’s Glass Cleaner is made without the use of alcohol and ammonia, so that it is safe to use on tinted windows, common in most cars these days.

DIRECTIONS:
-Shake well!
-Spray a fine mist over the area you wish to clean.
-Wipe off with a clean, microfiber towel.

entry.title: Wowo's All Purpose Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: All Purpose Cleaner
Price: 12.99

Wowo’s ALL-PURPOSE CLEANER is great for cleaning all surfaces. Dirty Engine? Done! Dirty Tire/Rubber? Done! Dirty Greasy Fabrics? Done! Highly dilutable for each situation with a fresh clean scent and great lather, as well as powerful surfactants to help dissolve grime. Wowo’s ALL-PURPOSE CLEANER is the safe and easy choice. Super easy to use. Spray, Scrub, Wipe! This product has so many uses, we challenge you to find your favorite!

  • ESSENTIAL PART OF EVERY DETAIL: Safe For Cleaning And Decontaminating All Types Of Surfaces
  • WORKS GREAT IN A SPRAY FOAMER: Ability To Produce Thick, Long Dwelling Foam That Easily Breaks Up Dirt And Grime Using Your Favorite Foam Sprayer (Such As The iK FOAM PRO 2 or PRO 12)
  • DEGREASER / CLEANER: For Effective Use On All Rubber, Plastic, Fabric, Etc.
  • HIGHLY DILUTABLE: Easily Dilutes To Fit Your Needs From 20:1, 10:1, or 1:1 Depending Upon Use/Application
  • AMERICA'S PREMIER AUTOMOTIVE MICROFIBER and Detailing Products Manufacturer / Distributor Since 1999. THE RAG COMPANY - Always The Better Value!

How To Use:

  1. Make sure the trigger sprayer is pointing away from you
  2. Spray on the affected area
  3. For stubborn areas of dirt, leave to saturate for a minute or so
  4. Wipe off with a quality Microfiber cloth
  5. Yes, it really is that easy to use!

entry.title: Wowo's Waterless Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Vehicle Washing & Glass Cleaning
Price: 10.99

Don’t have access to a hose or simply need to give your vehicle a quick wipe down? We’ve got you covered with Wowo’s WATERLESS WASH! Simply spray-on, wipe, and buff off. The ultimate Waterless Wash!

☑️ USE ANYWHERE, ANYTIME: No Hose Access? No Problem!

☑️ USE IN-BETWEEN WASHES: Keep Your Car Looking Clean Or Dilute 3:1 As A Clay Lube

☑️ SAFE FOR ALL SURFACES: Confidently Use On Paint, Glass, Plastics, Trim And Wheels

☑️ HIGHLY DILUTABLE: Ability To Dilute To Your Needs (Recommended At 5:1, 3:1, or 1:1 Depending Upon Type Of Paint Protection Present On Finish. Use Higher Dilution Ratio On Coated Vehicles – Test Before Using To Mitigate Any Risk Of Streaking)

Wowo’s WATERLESS WASH is great for all types of situations whether used in the garage between washes or on a road trip without access to a hose! Made it to the Car Show and the wind kicked up some dust? Reach for some WATERLESS WASH to safely and effectively encapsulate and emulsify that dirt and dust without scratching your finish! Simply Spray On, Wipe Off, and Buff to achieve a great looking shine every time! Superior lubrication for your paint surface and Anti-Static capabilities that will help keep your car looking cleaner, longer.

entry.title: Wowo's Tyre Restorer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Wheel Maintenance
Price: 25.99

Wowo’s TYRE RESTORER delivers a new tire sheen and helps maintain that desired appearance with results that last and won’t sling up the sides of your car. The Fresh Peach Scent is a sensory bonus - Viola!

☑️ LOOKS LIKE NEW RUBBER, SMELLS LIKE FRESH PEACHES: Wowo’s TYRE RESTORER Gives Tires a New, Clean Look And The Fresh Peach Smell Is An Application Sensory Bonus!

☑️ DRY TO TOUCH + POSITIVELY LASTING RESULTS: Rub All You Want, No Unwanted Greasy Or Slimy Feel That Competitor’s Products Can Give You

☑️ NO DRESSING SLING: Unlike Many Other Dressings, This Won’t End Up On The Side of Your Car

☑️ NO SILICONE: Water-Based Dressing that Contains NO Silicone

☑️ AMERICA'S PREMIER AUTOMOTIVE MICROFIBER and DETAILING PRODUCTS Manufacturer / Distributor Since 1999. THE RAG COMPANY - Always The Better Value!

Wowo’s TYRE RESTORER is like taking a new set of tires through an Orchard of Peaches. It may not make sense, but it just works and smells great. This Water-Based dressing contains NO Silicone or harmful ingredients to negatively affect the look of your awesome rubber. Wowo’s TYRE RESTORER can be sprayed directly onto the tire or worked in with your favorite Foam or Microfiber Applicator. The product can be layered after a short dry time to add more shine as needed. The result will be a dry-to-the-touch tire with no sling on the side of your vehicle. What more could you want?

entry.title: Wowo's Quick Detailer
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 16.99

Wowo’s QUICK DETAILER is The Boss of all Quick Detailers. Other quick detailers look at it and ask why they aren’t this awesome. Simply spray on and buff off for epic shine and protection. Done.

☑️ GLOSS & PROTECTION THAT'S SMOOTH AS GLASS: Takes Quick Detailing And Touch Ups To The Next Level With Great Results And A Fantastic Smell.  Sensory Overload!

☑️ SAFE ON ALL EXTERIOR SURFACES: Clear Coated Paint, Single Stage Paint, Glass, Plastics, Rubber Trim, And Metal

☑️ ADVANCED POLYMER UV INHIBITORS: Effective Protection From Harmful UV Rays

☑️ EXTREMELY VERSATILE: Perfect For Quick Wipe-Offs Between Washes; Adding Gloss & Protection After a Wash; Or As A Slick Drying Aid

 

Wowo’s QUICK DETAILER is the perfect combination of gloss, slickness, and ease of use in one bottle. If the scent doesn’t win you over, the results will! Simply spray QUICK DETAILER onto the exterior of your vehicle and wipe off with a Premium Microfiber Towel. Flip the towel as needed. We recommend applying it to one panel at a time and enjoy the process (and the fantastic smell)! It can be used for light dusting, lubricant as a drying aid, or on a freshly washed vehicle for added shine. The result will be a high gloss, hydrophobic finish with deep color enhancement. They don’t call Wowo’s QUICK DETAILER “The Boss” for nothing!

entry.title: Wowo's Mallow Wax
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 62.99

As soft as a marshmallow and as smooth as glass, Wowo’s MALLOW WAX is the ultimate blend of old school cool, with the latest surface coating technology, resulting in the ultimate show wax. Super easy on, and super easy off with lasting results and phenomenal beading. The ultimate wax for the person who loves to wax their vehicle regularly.

☑️ HIGH-GLOSS: Wowo’s MALLOW WAX Is A High-Gloss Show Ready Wax  

☑️ EASY-ON, EASY-OFF: Easy To Apply And Even Easier to Remove

☑️ UV RESISTANCE: Offers Strong Protection From Harmful UV Rays With A Brilliant Shine

☑️ OLD SCHOOL COOL: The Look Of An Old-School Paste Wax With The Latest In Surface Coating Technology

Wowo’s MALLOW WAX is as Soft as a Marshmallow and as Smooth as Glass. MALLOW WAX is a proprietary blend of Brazilian Carnuba Wax, Montan Wax, and Resins for a High-Gloss Masterpiece. The Blend of Old School Cool with the latest in surface coating technology keeps paste wax alive and well. The application process is as easy as they come! Simply take a Foam or Microfiber Applicator and give it a couple twists within the can of wax. Once the applicator is coated with a layer of wax, apply it to a painted panel. You can do one panel at a time or all the panels at once if you would prefer to let the product set. The choice is yours! Once you’ve made your go around and the air smells of Freshly Roasted Marshmallows, take a Premium Microfiber Towel and buff the wax off. The result will be a High-Gloss, Show-Ready Finish. Now you just need some chocolate and graham crackers to complete the experience! [PRO TIP: avoid application on rubber or plastic trim to mitigate the risk of minor discoloration]

entry.title: Wowo's Leather Cream
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Interior Cleaning & Care
Price: 22.99

If you like going to the spa and getting a wonderful massage, then that’s what Wowo’s LEATHER CREAM does for your leather. It’s like a luxurious massage from the best masseuse, leaving your leather looking and feeling great!

☑️ PROTECTS YOUR LEATHER: Wowo’s LEATHER CREAM Provides A Strong Layer Of Protection and Supple Feel To Your Leather

☑️ RESTORES THE PORES: Just Like Dry Skin, Your Leather Needs to Be Moisturized For A Long Life In All Weather Conditions

☑️ UV RESISTANCE TO HARMFUL RAYS: Effectively Helps Your Leather Resist Fading And Cracking In Direct Sunlight  

☑️ MATTE LOOK AND SMOOTH FEEL: Leaves Leather Looking and Feeling New Without The Unwanted Shine Or Oils Other Products May Leave

Wowo’s LEATHER CREAM is Step Two in the Wowo’s Leather Cleaning System! If your Leather were to go to a Spa, this is the final product it would ask for. It’s like a luxuriating massage from the best masseuse, leaving your leather looking and feeling great. Before applying Wowo’s LEATHER CREAM, we recommend giving your leather s good cleaning with Wowo’s LEATHER CLEANER. To Apply: 1) Give the bottle a good shake and put some cream onto an Applicator or quality Microfiber Towel, 2) Work the product into the leather like you know what you’re doing! Work it! And 3) Using another clean Microfiber Towel, wipe the seat to a smooth dry finish. Voila, you’re done!

entry.title: Wowo's Interior Cleaner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Interior Cleaning & Care
Price: 11.99

You asked for it, we delivered! Finally, a one-stop interior cleaner you can use on every part of your car’s interior. Wowo’s INTERIOR CLEANER is an excellent choice for cleaning everything from the dash and door panels, to the seats and carpets. INTERIOR CLEANER does it all!

☑️ A QUALITY “CLEAN-IT-ALL” PRODUCT: Wowo’s INTERIOR CLEANER Can Be Used On All Interior Surfaces Including Carpets, Fabric Seats, Plastics, Leather, LCD Displays And More!

Simply spray on a surface and wipe off with a quality Microfiber towel. For deeper stains or stubborn dirt, spray the affected area and use a brush to agitate before wiping with a Microfiber towel. From Carpets to Plastics, the result will end in a clean, fresh look. Wowo’s INTERIOR CLEANER contains no additives or UV protectants so we highly recommend following-up with Wowo’s INTERIOR FINISHER for all your hard surfaces!  Now, stop reading and get to cleaning!

entry.title: Wowo's Crystal Sealant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 22.99

Wowo’s Crystal Sealant nano-polymer spray sealant for car and truck paint. The sealant's cross-linking nano siloxane creates a mesh across the paint surface that is extremely detergent resistant! That strong bond means that one application will give up to a year of hydrophobic protection.

  • EASY APPLICATION: you do not need to be a professional detailer to be successful with Crystal Sealant.
  • NANO-POLYMER TECHNOLOGY: creates a strong bond with your vehicle’s paint finish.
  • LONG-LASTING PROTECTION: the sealant's strong polymer resin base makes a protective hydrophobic layer over the paint.
  • MULTIPLE SURFACES: apply Crystal Sealant on paint, wheels, glass, and plastics.
  • GLOSSY DEEP FINISH: your car will not only be protected, but also look amazing with a impressive shine.

Directions for use:

  1. Work in small areas.
  2. Spray directly onto surface OR spray onto foam applicator and apply in criss-cross pattern.
  3. Buff off with a clean microfiber towel.
  4. Do not let the product dry before buffing.

entry.title: Wowo's Contact 121
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: Paint Protection
Price: 79.99

Wowo’s CONTACT 121 is a beautifully formulated and hand-crafted wax utilizing a unique blend of traditional high-grade Brazilian Carnauba Wax, Californian Montan Wax, and the latest German and Swiss surface coating technology. This amazing combination creates an easy-on, easy-off experience with long-lasting protection, shine, and an extremely high water contact angle of 121 degrees.

☑️ ESSENTIAL PART OF DETAIL PROTECTION: Quickly and Easily Lay Down a Great Next Generation Coat of Wax For Effective Protection and Lasting Beauty

☑️ SUPERIOR WATER REPELLENCY: Water Rolls Right Off Today, Tomorrow, Next Month…and Beyond!

☑️ EASY-ON, EASY-OFF APPLCATION: Simply Wipe-On and Wipe-Off (Build Muscles At The Gym, Not While Waxing Your Car)

☑️ SHINE LIKE NO OTHER: Provides a Truly Deep, Glossy Finish – Every Time

Wowo’s CONTACT 121 is Old School Cool wrapped in New School Tech. A mix of some of the finest Brazilian Carnauba and Montan Waxes, blended with the latest cutting-edge German and Swiss surface technology. This results in an easy-to-use paste wax that provides a deep gloss and shine for your paint. Equally as important, CONTACT 121 provides superior water repellency with an amazing surface contact angle of 121 degrees, meaning water is incapable of sitting on the protected surface. The application process is as easy as they come! Simply take a Foam or Microfiber Applicator and give it a couple twists within the can of wax. Once the applicator is coated with a layer of wax, apply it to a painted panel. You can do one panel at a time or all the panels at once if you would prefer to let the product set. The choice is yours! Once you’ve made your go around, take a Premium Microfiber Towel and buff the wax off. The result will be a High-Gloss, Show-Ready Finish. Grab some CONTACT 121 and EXPERIENCE THE MAGIC for yourself! [PRO TIP: avoid application on rubber or plastic trim to mitigate the risk of minor discoloration]

entry.title: Wowo's Clean Wheels
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wowo's
Type: wheel maintenance
Price: 18.00

Wowo’s CLEAN WHEELS is the Next Generation in quality wheel cleaning products. The Highly Concentrated Non-Acid formula easily cuts through brake dust and grime, leaving your wheels CLEAN and FRESH! Wowo’s CLEAN WHEELS also contains RUST INHIBITORS to help protect your wheels in the future and is safe on rubber tires getting them back to looking new. Highly Dilutable! We recommend 10:1 for Coated Wheels, 5:1 for General Monthly Cleaning and 3:1 for Heavily Soiled Wheels. Wowo’s CLEAN WHEELS is a professional-grade product that’s a great value producing…well…CLEAN WHEELS! What are you waiting for? 

  • MADE FOR DETAILER’S BY DETAILERS: Wowo’s CLEAN WHEELS Is A Professional-Grade Formulation That Works – REALLY Well!
  • FOAM SPRAYER/CANNON READY: Ability to Produce Thick, Long Dwelling Foam In Your Favorite Automotive Foam Sprayer (Recommended 10:1 Dilution For Foam Sprayers Such As The iK FOAM PRO 2 or PRO 12)
  • NON-ACID CLEANER: Safe For All Types Of Wheels (Use The Correct Dilution For Your Wheels)
  • HIGHLY DILUTABLE: Ability To Dilute To Your Needs (Recommended At 10:1 for Foaming Pump Sprayer, 5:1 for Light Cleaning, or 3:1 for Heavy Cleaning – Test Before Using)

How To Use:

  1. Check for compatibility on chrome or unlacquered aluminum
  2. Spray liberally all over your wheels and allow the cleaner to do its work
  3. Don't allow Clean Wheels to dry on the surface
  4. Agitate the wheel with a wheel cleaning brush and/or a mitt dedicated to washing wheels
  5. Hose off and remove all dirt and grime
  6. stand back and smile at your handiwork
